title: CBIC ने जारी की HSNS Cess के Login, Registration, और Payment Procedures पर Advisories (Advisories 01/2026 & 02/2026, 1 फरवरी 2026 से प्रभावी)
content:
# CBIC ने जारी की HSNS Cess के Login, Registration, और Payment Procedures पर Advisories (Advisories 01/2026 & 02/2026, 1 फरवरी 2026 से प्रभावी)

Ek important update hai. Government ne Health Security National Security (HSNS) Cess ke login, registration, aur payment procedures ke liye advisories announce kiye hain.

*   Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) ne do mahatvapurna advisories, Advisory No. 01/2026 aur Advisory No. 02/2026, jari ki hain.
*   Yeh advisories Directorate General of Systems & Data Management, Chennai dwara issue ki gayi hain.
*   HSNS Cess, jo Health Security National Security Cess Act, 2025 ke तहत अधिसूचित किया गया था, 1 February 2026 se operative ho gaya hai.
*   Advisory No. 01/2026 mein HSNS Cess ke liye login procedure, naye registration ke liye application filing, aur payment ki detailed step-by-step process di gayi hai.
*   Advisory No. 02/2026 HSNS Cess ke payment ke liye accounting head ke bare mein batati hai.
*   Taxpayers, especially jo specified goods ke manufacture ya supply mein involved hain, unhe ab CBIC ke official Goods & Service Tax portal (www.cbic-gst.gov.in) par register karna aur payment karna hoga.
*   Yeh advisories CBIC ki official GST portal par prominently feature kiye gaye hain.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.cbic-gst.gov.in/HSNS/ADVISORY_01_2026.pdf)
*   [Download Advisory 02/2026 here](https://www.cbic-gst.gov.in/HSNS/ADVISORY_02_2026.pdf)

*Published on: 2 February 2026*
